comments:
Build ID: v200710290500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a standard make project
2. Call ScannerConfigNature.initializeDiscoveryOptions after the project has been created (this is needed in our own projects, since we do not use the build system of CDT)
3. CDT crashes sporadically (see stacktrace). It is hard to reproduce.

This might also be a problem in client code. In any case, I would appreciate some hints how to prevent this exception.
